description:
Overview The plot and the darkness thicken as detective Cal McDonald and his ghoul-in-the-know partner, Mo'Lock, delve further into the deadly horror unraveling around them. Strange experiments are being conducted by a mysterious and unknown madman, and it's up to Cal to track him down before an unholy and, frankly, quite annoying Hell is unleashed on Los Angeles. McDonald will be forced to rethink everything he has ever known about monsters ... or die trying.Â 

Niles and Templesmith's last book, 30 Days of Night, scared the pants off comics readers ... so grab yourself a belt and get ready for the next wave of nightmares.
name: Geekstein

volume.name: Criminal Macabre: A Cal McDonald Mystery

description: Overview What does a reclusive, germ-a-phobe, monster obsessed, flea raising, dead man have to do with the entire planet becoming overrun by monsters? That's exactly what Cal McDonald would like to know as he ducks and weaves his way through a labyrinth of nut-cases and freaks trying to unravel the greatest threat to mankind since...the last time Cal was on the case! Now if he can just stay sober long enough to solve the mystery.
name: Bubonic Nights

volume.name: Criminal Macabre: A Cal McDonald Mystery

description: The mystery is solved, and the nefarious enemy has been identified, but still monsters are running rampant on the streets of Los Angeles. Now Cal McDonald has to find a way to stop them--but when you're a guy like Cal, what do you do when everything you have ever believed has been turned inside-out, upside-down, and sideways? First you assemble your only friends, who just happen to be ghouls...then you pack a lot of guns, buckets of holy water, and a prayer or two for good measure. It's Cal versus the monsters in an urban ghoul throwdown like you've never seen before--and it's going to get messy!
name: American Freakshow

volume.name: Criminal Macabre: A Cal McDonald Mystery

description: If good intentions pave the road to hell, then Cal McDonald should just get in the handbasket already and buckle up for the ride. He's no do-gooder--not by far--but he does everything he can to keep supernatural forces of evil from harming humans; and it always comes at a great personal expense, taking everything and everyone he's ever owned or cared about. Now he's being set up by the cops and a vengeful D.A. to take the fall for a pile of bad news. There's no way he's getting out of this one without serving some time at the graybar hotel. A little time in lock-up would be like a vacation compared to what Cal's been through lately, but forces both human and monster alike are lining up to make sure Cal's trip to the slammer is the last trip he ever takes.

Â 
Celebrate fifty blockbuster issues with this extra-sized extravaganza as we reveal the untold tale of Thomas Wayne's meeting with Jor-El and how it shaped Gotham City's future! You don't dare miss this one! The past was just prologue for this latest adventure of the World's Finest duo as an ancient Kryptonian artifact is uncovered, unleashing past and present dangers that may alter the duo's future. Not even the guest-starring Titans will be able to save them! This issue also features a variant cover by the original SUPERMAN/BATMAN art team of Ed McGuinness & Dexter Vines!Â  Â  Â 
Â 
Batman & Superman find some Kryptonian technology which leads to a historical vision of Thomas Wayne's meeting with Jor-El, who is looking for information on Earth to decide if he wants to send his son there. Batman & Superman soon find out the vision actually happened through journals left by both parents, and that if it weren't for their fathers neither man would be who they are today.
name: The Fathers

description: Thoroughly off the wagon, sleuth/soul DJ Morrison takes a trip into his checkered past, unaware that his friends are being led into danger, and even more unaware of his own impending fate. Don't miss an issue of the series Mania.com calls "HELLBLAZER meets The Mod Squad."
name: The Forests of the Night

description:
Overview
Cal McDonald-the hair-triggered, smart ass, tough guy, private dick monster hunter comes back to Dark Horse this month, and he's brought his strangest nemesis with him.Â 

Horror maestro Steve Niles collaborated with fantastic artist Kyle Hotz (Marvel'sÂ Manthing, Dark Horse'sÂ Billy the KidÂ ) to bring to vivid, spooky life Cal's first-ever encounter with a real-deal golem. From the folklore of Jewish mysticism, the earthy homunculus is given shape and purpose by a grief-stricken father, out to exact vengeance on the man who attacked his daughter. In a bizarre twist of fate, the golem is loosed on the world with no master and only one known purpose-to kill! Cal's gotta do whatever it takes to stop this marauding hunk of clay from a pointless killing spree or . . . or, there's gonna be a pointless killing spree!

Overview
Cal McDonald has faced down all manner of monsters from bloodthirsty zombies to ancient vampires, but his newest case is the thorniest yet. Cal has to find out if a devil-worshiping cult has succeeded in their quest to bring Satan to earth, dodge vengeful cops, and stay one step ahead of a group of vicious priests in possession of a terrifying secret weapon

Overview
Cal McDonald: drug-fueled paranormal private investigator, friend of ghouls and werewolves, vampire slayer . . . babysitter? Cal finds himself protecting a baby who has a good chance of growing up to be Satan's representative on Earth, while facing down a bunch of devoted devil worshipers and a relentless, reanimated Templar Knight ready and willing to slay anyone in his path!

Overview
So, let's see. Where were we? Let's get everyone up to speed on Cal McDonald's most recent exploits. Last we saw of Cal and his ghoul buddy Mo'Lock, they'd snuck into a secret compound of Satanists who were having a birthday party for a cute little baby whose papa is the devil himself. That was right before Cal nabbed the baby and Mo' got himself chopped in half by a thousand-year-old Templar Knight who's been waiting for his curtain call since about 1118 A.D. With his partner sliced to oblivion and a sweet little Satanic bundle of baby girl in his arms, Cal's got to think fast or he and his new charge will be sharing Mo'Lock's bloody fate

1. Splash page by unknown.
  2. "Today Mars, Tomorrow... the Universe" (Superman, Batman, J'onn J'onzz, Hawkman, Hawkgirl, Supergirl (flashback) written by Bob Haney, penciled by Curt Swan, inked by Murphy Anderson, colored by Jerry Serpe and lettered by Debra Schulman. The story continues from the Martian Manhunter stories from Adventure Comics #449-451.
  3. "The Man-Bear Stalks at Midnight" (Green Arrow, Black Canary) written by Gerry Conway, penciled by Mike Nasser and inked by Terry Austin.
  4. "Hospital of Fear" (Black Canary) written by Gerry Conway, penciled by Mike Nasser and inked by Terry Austin.
  5. "The Plague Makers!" (The Vigilante) written by Bill Kunkel, penciled and inked by Gray Morrow.
  6. "Hell on Skis" (Wonder Woman) written by Gerry Conway, penciled by James Sherman, inked by Bob Wiacek and colored by Liz Berube.
  7. "Daily Planet" Volume 77 Issue 11 week of March 14, 1977 edited by Bob Rozakis, production by Anthony Tollin and lettered by Typeset. Featuring are the Challengers of the Unknown murderers? Find out in Challengers of the Unknown #81. Which Legionnaire will die in order to maintain peace in the world? Find out in Superboy and the Legion of Super-Heroes #228, "Lola Barnett's Comicsworld" Superboy returns to the pages of Adventure Comics, the Doom Patrol returns in the latest issue of Showcase, the Men of War debuts, Super-Team Family #11 and Super-Team Family #12 team-ups revealed and finally the origin of the Justice Society of America in a future issue of DC Special. Plus, the solution to last week's word search puzzle and "Direct Currents".

Notes:

  • Expanding Clamp Arrow, Glove Arrow and Cocoon Arrow used.
  • Green Arrow and Black Canary story takes place in the Catskills, New York.
  • Vigilante story takes place in Poplar Bluff, Missouri.
  • This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Green Lantern in "Half the People Here...".
name: Today Mars, Tomorrow... the Universe / The Man-Bear Stalks at Midnight / Hospital of Fear / The Plague Makers! / Hell on Skis

description:
1. Cover by Nick Cardy.
  2. "The Secret of Harpy Castle" written by Leo Dorfman, penciled and inked by Kurt Schaffenberger. (Jimmy Olsen as Mr. Action, Percy Bratton and Superman) - 11 pages
  3. "The Shadow from the Grave" written by Leo Dorfman, penciled and inked by Kurt Schaffenberger. (Jimmy Olsen, Superman, Lois Lane, Perry White, Lucy Lane as Lena Lawrence, Melba Manton) - 9 pages
name: The Secret of Harpy Castle / The Shadow from the Grave

description:
1. An Iron Cage for a Hero! (Superboy / written by Leo Dorfman)

2. The Return of Superbaby's Pal (Super Baby, Ma and Pa Kent / written by Leo Dorfman)

3. The Monster-Maker of Littleville (Dial H for Hero / written by Dave Wood : reprinted from: House of Mystery #162)
name: An Iron Cage for a Hero!; The Return of Superbaby's Pal; The Monster-Maker of Littleville

description: This story was reprinted from newspaper strips from 1945-1946.
name: Zane Grey's King of the Royal Mounted

description:
1. Osogood Silver Polish (Uncle Scrooge)

2. Only a Poor Old Man (Uncle Scrooge, Donald Duck, Huey, Dewie, Louie, the Beagle Boys)

3. Coffee for Two (Uncle Scrooge)

4. Soupline Eight (Uncle Scrooge)
name: Walt Disney's Uncle Scrooge in Only a Poor Man

description: A new saga for the Iron Fist begins here! Daniel Rand is blessed with the mystic power of Kâun-Lunâs most ancient force. But when the Steel Serpent, Iron Fistâs most antagonistic foe, steals the power of the Dragon for himself, who will suffer? Danny Rand, Iron Fist no longer?
name: Meet Iron Fist

description: Iron Fist faces his greatest challenge at the hands of the merciless Steel Serpent! Can Danny Rand rise to the challenge, or will he, and the hidden city of K'un-Lun fall?
name: Meet Iron Fist - 2 of 2

description: Odin questions his authority! How will this play out for Midgard?
Harvey Dent meets Holman Hunt, a disfigured firefighter that the villain sees a spark of himself in.
name: Two-Face Too!

description: Concluding "Sven The Returned." With the great battle for Orkney settled, Sven now must decide what he must do with his enemies, his allies and â most important â his birthright.
name: Sven The Returned, Part 8: The Return of the Exiled

description: "Uncorp Asunder," part 1 of 2. A venerable Swamp Thing villain makes an uninvited appearance in Aberrance as Constance Sunderland looks to the UnVolve technology to "re-engineer" her fading beauty. Her sights are set on the expectant daddy, Janus Sr., whose determination to carry his freakish child to term threatens the very existence of The Un-Men.
name: Un-Men Asunder, Chapter 1

description:
Overview:

A threat to the minds of the whole human race sends the FF somewhere they've never been before: into the realm of fiction itself! Where Ben finds himself clobbering a demonic army to save the cast of Sense and Sensibility. No, really. And it gets weirder from there. Dante (not the one from Clerks)! Willie Lumpkin! Behold, the Fictocraft! And it's actually kind of smart and serious too. You're at least going to flip open the first page in your comic store, right?
name: The Melancholy Of Susan Richards

description:
Overview:

SECRET INVASION continues here! Intergalactic war comes to the streets of Manhattan! As Ms. Marvel stands alone before the Skrull invasion, she must find the warrior within and stop an army of invincible killers!
name: Secret Invasion: The Battle Of Manhattan. Part 2

description: This is a story about killing the future. 1959 is the dawn of the new age of superheroicsâthe so-called âFireworksâ have granted superhuman powers to three Americans, and set the world on a collision-course with destiny. But itâs a destiny Philip Voight must prevent at any cost. The first newuniversal one-shot expands the mythos of this world, thanks to writer KIERON GILLEN (Phonogram), hand-picked by newuniversalâs Warren Ellis, and the brilliant art of GREG SCOTT shows us the world, like it never wasâ¦in 1959.

Overview:

"OPERATION: BREAK-IN!" Â 
As the situation in the Negative Zone continues devolving, Ben and Johnny realize that their one chance to get back home resides with a criminal mastermind...trapped in Reed's prison for non-registered heroes and villains! It's the new Fantastic Four, True believers--the Thing, the Human Torch, Franklin, and Valeria--making one last-ditch attempt to save the Baxter Building from complete destruction! Â
name: No one gets back alive! Part 3: Escape from Fantasy Island

description:
Whose terrible stride shakes the war-torn wastelands of Sakaar? Whose blind Shadow Priest calls for the blood of babes? Whose barbarian horde rides monsters through your nightmares? Behold and lament, my beautiful son, for the Axeman Cometh!

Slaves and guards alike are frightened of the new green monstrosity before them. The nomads question who this beast is, it is surly not the boy they were escorting, while this creaturensaves them itbisnnot their true savior. A stranger to them all knows the truth. The boy has half hulk in him, he informs the peplebwhat he knows, who Skaar is. The stranger warns Skaar to take some caution for they haven't preformed the ceremony to induce the stone skin. This slows Skaar pittle , makes quick work of the guards, slicing and killing them with ease and an almost sort of grace. The Axeman fearful and superstitious must notbloosebthis fight, he summons the last three dragons he has in his stable. Again Skaar is licked and drowned in thierbflames but this time it means

The once great and noble princes, Onaka, witnesses the flying dragoons in the distance and knows though Skaar is mighty and needs no aid, her once proud people need all the help any can muster. She runs into the fray, only giving pause when she realizes Skaars rage is so grave h won't be able from killing off the last dragons in existence ending the noble red skinned beasts forevermore. For now the battle is over, the barbarians retreat to the hills. Their shadow priests wars not to leave their two biggest enemies together to plot but the Axeman believes Skaar and Omaka will tear each other apart.
name: Blood Of The Dragon

description:
Even with three issues every month, we can't fit everything we want into Amazing Spider-Man. So BRAND NEW DAY: EXTRA!! takes a deeper glimpse into Spidey's new world with three stories that flesh out his family, friends and foes, stories that will affect Spidey deeply over the coming months. Spidey Braintrust members Guggenheim and Wells welcome Joe Kelly (DEADPOOL, Superman) for a one-shot marking the return of one of Peter's most unforgettable enemies: Hammerhead! It's a sign of things to comeâ¦and it's looking deadly. Â 

Included in this issue are the stories:

"Death of a Wise Guy" by Joe Kelly

"Birthday Boy" by Zeb Wells

"The Spartacus Gambit. Â CharacterÂ Assassination: Interlude" by Marc Guggenheim
name: Death of a Wise Guy; Birthday Boy; The Spartacus Gambit - Character Assassination: Interlude

description: Super heroes running a female fight club? Unbelievable perhaps, but it's a tale of depravity that will send shockwaves across the globe once the sordid details appear on a podcast uploaded by the TRUE BELIEVERS! Who are these counter-culture subversives with strange powers and abilities who have proclaimed themselves 'warriors of the information age'? The True Believers not only speak truth to power, they wield it like a weapon using it to root out lies and deception, cover-ups and conspiracies wherever they find them. Whether itâs S.H.I.E.L.D. or the Illuminati, HYDRA or Weapon X, the CIA or the CSA, no target is too big and no one is off-limitsâincluding a wary superhuman community with plenty of its own secrets to hide!
name: Payback Is A Bitch

description:
Overview:

âWar of the Symbiotesâ rages on â as the Ultimate Beetle takes flight! Deep inside the corporate headquarters of Roxxon lies a vial containing the creepy black symbiote substanceâ¦or at least it did, until the Beetle stole it! Can Spider-Man capture this bug thug before disaster strikes, and what is Nick Fury and S.H.I.E.L.D.âs interest in the stolen material? The answers await in the book that has Ainât It Cool News saying âItâs got excitement, emotion, actionâ¦I have such love for this book.â [ NOTE: It is based on the Ultimate Spider-man video game!! ]
name: War of the Symbiotes, Part 2

description:
Overview:

Acclaimed writer RICK REMENDER (The Atom, Punisher War Journal) spins the untold adventures of Teddy Roosevelt, Rough Rider, President of the United States and paranormal investigator as he uncovers a plot concocted by a band of nefarious aliens in cahoots with a malevolent ancient Mayan demon to eradicate humanity and claim Earth for their own purposes. A merging of The X-Files, Ghostbusters, and Indiana Jones, Creatures promises high-adventure starting one of Americaâs greatest heroes of the early twentieth century brought to glorious four-color life by Swedish superstar PETER BERGTING.

âBUSINESS IS WARâ

Welcome to the free market economy. ChimeraCorp and Humonics, Inc. fight over market share. The world's first enhanced humans take a more prominent, public role. And when internal conflict at one of the corporations results in the ouster of its founder, the federal government gets involved with concerns about the need for oversight. Plus jokes.
name: Business is War

description:
IPO

Having successfully created the worlds first enhanced humans, two rival companies have to navigate the sketchy world of venture capitalists in order to secure the necessary funding to take their their companies public. Hi-larious.
name: IPO

description: Scrap is left to defend Tower City by herself when the rest of the team is busy attending to more important matters. But whatâs more important than defending Tower City?

Inspired by the classic tale by Jules Verne, this story goes back to the land that he created. Mysterious Island has risen again, this time in 2008 and the infamous Captian Nemo is back to command a new set of monsters.

Two zoologists who've been hired to survey the day to day life of penguins on a rogue iceberg end up finding out their job is a lot more complicated than they originally expected. The entire primary cast is original, although Landis created a plot device to fit in a slew of Harryhausen monsters that a lot of people will probably be happy to see. The group later discovers that their secret helper is the reclusive Captain Nemo.

volume.name: Ray Harryhausen Presents: Back To Mysterious Island

description:
Galactica veteran writer Robert Napton continues to tell the previously untold day of the early days of William Adama!

The origins of Commander William Adama conclude here in this issue as we run up to the events of the SCIFI mini-series that recreated Battlestar Galactica are such a memorable way!
name: Adama Part 4 of 4

description: Continuing our story by Kevin Fahey (writer on the show and protege of comics legend Mark Verheiden) that explores the origins of Gaius Baltar and his life and loves that lead up to the second Cylon War. In this issue, set approximately 2 years before the Cylon Apocalypse as seen in the SCIFI mini-series, Baltar takes his place as the head of the Colonial Defense Network at the Defense Ministry on Caprica. But, as Baltar holds the fate of the Colonies in his hands, "Six" continues to enact her Cylon plan for the cocky Baltar, all the while the pair is heading towards the apocalypse.
name: Baltar Part 2 of 4

description: Kevin Fahey continues to explore the origins of Gaius Baltar and his life and loves that lead up to the second Cylon War. Events continue to spiral beyond the good doctor's control as the Cylons move their ultimate plan to deadly action!
name: Baltar Part 3 of 4

description: Kevin Fahey concludes the story of Gaius Baltar before the events of the second Cylon War. Events continue to spiral beyond the good doctor's control as the Cylons move their ultimate plan to deadly action!
name: Baltar Part 4 of 4

description: This issue is full of monkey business! The entire world has gone ape, and the Super Friends better find out why! So it's off to Gorilla City for a mystery so exciting, you'll go bananas for this issue! Plus, the usual fun and games!
name: Monkey Business
The Ghouls of Yanaidar; Conan the Syndicated
The Haunters of Castle Crimson; Heritage of Horror; A Bargain Betwixt Devils; The Testing of Zuleika; A Falling-Out Among Thieves; The Foe Within; Swords and Skulls; A Night of Bones
The Lair of the Ice Worm; The Nest of the Ice Worm!; People of the Dark
The Amra Saga - Part 1: The Long Night of Fang and Talon; A King Comes Riding; King Kull Lives; Cimmerian Postscripts
The Amra Saga - Part 3: Beyond The Black River; Legions of the Dead; Cimmerian Postscripts
The Amra Saga - Part 4: The Children of Jhebbal Sag; Blades of the Brotherhood
A Dream of Blood; A Knife in the Dark; The Island Without A Name
Quest for the Cobra Crown; Moon of Skulls; Conan the Syndicated
The Devil Tree of Gamburu; Moon of Skulls; Mirror of the Manticore
King Thoth-Amon; Moon of Skulls; Woman from Khitai
The Pool of the Black One - Part 1; The Curse of the Monolith
The Pool of the Black One - Part 2: Torrent of Doom; Riders Beyond the Sunrise; The Tiger of Atlantis
Incident in Argos; Queen of the Black Coast - Part 1; Satan's Sanctuary; The Hyborian Age

description:
Final episode of 'The Vort' this issue with a last page twist...

Cover: D'Israeli (The Vort)

  • Judge Dredd - Blindside (part 1) (Robbie Morrison - Richard Elson)
  • Defoe - Book Two - Brethren of the Night (part 8) (Pat Mills - Leigh Gallagher)
  • Nikolai Dante - Amerika (part 8) (Robbie Morrison - Simon Fraser)
  • Sinister Dexter - The Importance of Fleeing Ernest (part 2) (Dan Abnett - Anthony Williams)
  • The Vort (part 8 - final part) (Si Spurrier - D'Israeli)
name: Prog 1596

description:
Overview:

3-part tie-in to âSecret Invasion,â written by guest-writer Jason Aaron (WOLVERINE)! Â 
When the Skrulls come to town, it's all-out war in Wakanda. The alien invaders have war ships, advanced technology, super-powered soldiers and an army that outnumbers the Wakandans ten to one. Cake walk, right? Think again. Thereâs a reason Wakanda had never been conquered â and the Skrulls are about to find out whyâ¦the hard way. Â
name: See Wakanda And Die, Part 1

description: Logan owes the Hulk Gang. He owes them big, and theyâre not the kind to let a debt slide, even for the guy whoâ50 years agoâcalled himself Wolverine. So Loganâs agreed to a crazy ride across America with the blind archer, Hawkeye, to deliver a package to the East Coast. First stop: San Franciscoâ¦but only if Logan and Hawkeye can make it pastâthe GHOST RIDERS. MARK MILLAR and STEVE MCNIVENâthe best-selling creative team of the 21st centuryâcontinue the biggest Wolverine story the future has ever seen! Part 2 (of 8)
name: Old Man Logan: Part 2

description: The Core is the center of the known universe where ancient and well-established species have created powerful empires, federations and cooperatives. The Core is also the most dangerous place in existence, and younger races are not welcomed warmly. When the first human is appointed to an extraterrestrial Special Forces unit, the soldier must first earn the respect of his peers as he fights for the recognition of his species.
name: The Core

description:
Overview

 The Saga continues as we focus this issue on The Arrow and The Target! In New Shagri-La, the Black Terror leaves his companions and strikes out across the world as more and more heroes are appearing broken free from the power of the Urn! The Terror isn't the only one on the hunt though as Dynamic Family seek the heroes for their own means!

note: The issue title was left out of the single release.Â  It was revealed in the collected edition of Project Superpowers #0-7.
name: Let Slip the Dogs of War...

description: Kid Devil's out to prove himself, but that won't stop the latest object of his contempt from getting in the way! In the tradition of Tango and Cash, Starsky and Hutch, and Turner and Hooch comes this instant buddy classic! You've already read "The Blue and The Gold" â Is the world ready for â "The Red and the Blue"?
name: The Red and the Blue

description: "Retired" assassin Kalter MÃ¶rder seeks redemption for the only contract he ever blew when his team, the Bad Bay Hackers, battles the feared Dwarf Giants. MÃ¶rder finally gets his shot at star Giants blitzer Snazkazi Ungrim, and he's going to take it, no matter who else might die in the process!
name: #2 of 5

description: Welcome to a world where humans and mecha co-exist. What was once thought to be a symbiotic relationship between humans and machines has turned into a full-scale war due to rising resentment by their human creators. Burn, a boy fused with a mecha, continues his struggle to find understanding in the madness that is his world. Could the answer come in the innocence of a young orphan girl? And, enter the Bikers! Â

Two young men, Trent and Quince, are interested in making a movie about Typhoid Mary! While they gather the equipment needed for such a feat, Mary is on the hunt for a cold-blooded killer! By the time she quenches her blood thirst, Trent and Quince's real, sinister intentions become clear.
name: Snow White

description: Mary Walker, private eye? It sure seems that way when Maryâs mania sets off her investigation of a grisly crime. A girl for sale. A bullet with Typhoidâs name on it.
name: Cinderella

description: Interweaving, successive, voices infiltrate Maryâs mind. Violent acts are committed of which Typhoid has no recollection. Welcome to the prison within.
name: Sleeping Beauty

description: Was Typhoid Mary born to be bad? Cameras are rolling, guess weâll find out. Itâs the end of the road for solving a murder mystery.
name: Red Riding Hood

description: HUMAN REMAINS FLANIMALS co-creator ROB STEEEN illustrates a dead special issue! It's 2242: Vishoek & Keimond are a couple of working stiffs assigned to pick through the rotten corpses unearthed after the UN raid on MAPPO. Keimond however, has other things in mind...
name: Human Remains

description: While the Fallen Angel, Jude and Mariah embark on their journey to the third city of power, Sachs and Violens are still in Bete Noire, endeavoring to put together a resistance movement against Moloch. And if the city that shapes the world descends into civil war... can the rest of the world be far behind?

name: Rumble in the Jungle

description: From the creator of The 10th Muse comes the newest female group of unlikey heroes! Lonely high-schooler Karen Miller just wanted a dog. Instead, she got three of the most powerful, deadliest and hippest robot bodyguards to hit the sleepy town of Westville.The good news? Karen's three robots quickly become her best friends. The bad news? Someone very high up, Oval Office-high up, wants those robots back. And he won't stop at anything. Can an ordinary, if slightly unpopular, teen survive killer robots, super-powered school custodians, snotty classmates, chemically boosted monsters and hooded assassins while staying on track to become class valedictorian? Karen Miller's about to find out!

The origin of Daken, the son of Wolverine! Following in his fatherâs footsteps, Daken is inducted into a secret society of killers and trained by the master himselfâthe mysterious being known as Romulus. But now that Daken has been freed from his masterâs grasp by his father, Wolverine, has his training endedâ¦or has it just begun?
name: Son of X, Pt. 2

description:
INSPIRED BY THE SONGS OF TORI AMOS!

Over 80 of the best creators from every style and genre, have contributed over 50 stories to this anthology featuring stories inspired by the songs of multi-platinum recording artist, TORI AMOS. Featuring an introduction by NEIL GAIMAN, with stories by creators such as CARLA SPEED McNEIL, MARK BUCKINGHAM, C.B. CEBULSKI, NIKKI COOK, HOPE LARSON, JOHN NEY REIBER, RYAN KELLY and many, many others, COMIC BOOK TATTOO encapsulates the breadth, depth and beauty of modern comics in this coffee table format book.

Collection of comic strips based on the songs of Tori Amos.
name: HC/SC

description: Murderous intrigue continues aboard the I.S.S. Enterprise, as First Officer James T. Kirk sets in motion the machinations that will result in the murder of Captain Christopher Pike, and the ultimate prize for Kirk: the captain's chair! But what does Spock have to say about it -- and whose side is he on? A dark, twisted reflection of Starfleet history continues!

Featuring two never-before-seen stories illustrated by the late, legendary Dave Cockrum. First up, relive the history of the X-Men, as recounted by Professor X and his old friend, former FBI Agent Fred Duncan. Then, the New Mutants â Rictor, Boom Boom, Cannonball, Rusty, Skids, Sunspot and Wolfsbane â face off against the Mad Thinker.
Â
name: Odd Men Out; The New Mutants in Think Again!

description:
1. Cover by Nick Cardy.
  2. "The Olsen Experiment" written by Leo Dorfman, penciled and inked by Kurt Schaffenberger. (Jimmy Olsen, Perry White, Superman) - 12 pages
  3. "The Face of a Nightmare!" written by David George, penciled and inked by Kurt Schaffenberger. (Jimmy Olsen as Mr. Action, Superman, Lucy Lane as Lena Lawrence) - 8 pages
name: The Olsen Experiment / The Face of a Nightmare!

description:
1. Super-Savage -- Master of Metropolis (Superboy / written by Leo Dorfman)

2. Curse of the Blood Crystals! (A New Tale of the Legion of Super-Heroes / written by Cary Bates : reprinted in: Superboy and the Legion of Super-Heroes, Legion of Super- Heroes Archives #10)
name: Super-Savage -- Master of Metropolis ; Curse of the Blood Crystals!

description: In the conclusion to the first Locke & Key story, by New York Times best-selling author Joe Hill and artistic wonder Gabriel Rodriguez, Sam Lesser has promised to kill each of the Locke children, one at a time, if he doesn't get what he wants: the key to anywhere, and the key to the black door. Six-year-old Bode, though, has made a desperate bargain with the creature in the wellhouse... set her free, and she'll stop Sam herself... Locke & Key has been optioned by Dimension Films.
name: Welcome to Lovecraft, Chapter Six

description:
Nightwing and Robin take on Bracuda and Chulo in "Partners." Script by Doug Moench, art by Bob McLeod. Plus: Green Lantern in "The Color of Courage." Script by Brian Augustyn, pencils by J.H. Williams III, inks & colors by George Freeman; The Creeper in "A Cold Night in Hell." Plot & breakdowns by Keith Giffen, dialog by Alan Grant, art & colors by Ted McKeever. Cover by Alan Davis & Mark Farmer.

Robin and Nightwing â Partners

After the explosion last issue, Gotham City police show up to harass Robin and Nightwing. This does not slow the heroes down, however, and they continue their pursuit of Big Chulo and Ramon Bracuda via a tracking signal they planted. Both the heroes and G.C.P.D. close in on Chulo and Bracuda, as the criminals burn their evidence. Chulo and Bracuda kidnap the cops on their trail, intent on burning them to death in an old warehouse. Robin and Nightwing bust in, save the cops, and bring down Chulo and Bracuda. The two heroes realize what good partners they make.

Green Lantern â The Color of Courage

Rookie Green lantern Lan Dibbux calls upon Hal Jordanâs help. A yellow uninhabited warship is orbiting the planet Faeâen, intent on destruction. The Green Lanterns warn the inhabitants, but the people of Faeâen seem unconcerned, because their protector âGreen Lanternâ will help them. The Lanterns are confused, because Lan Dibbux is the G.L. assigned to this sector. Soon enough, when the warship attacks, an elderly humanoid calling himself Green Lantern arrives, powered with energy gauntlets and a jet pack. As the three fight the warship, the old man Kristogar Velo proves himself worthy of the name Green Lantern, and Lan Dibbux steps up from his rookie jitters to also be a hero. We find out that Velo was an old friend of Abin Sur, and was sent here to be a champion. The Lanterns leave, happy to have Velo continue to guard Faeâen.

The Creeper â A Cold Night in Hell

On Christmas Eve, the Creeper finds himself on the snow-filled streets of Boston calling a phone sex line and talking to âPaula Passion.â Bored on the streets, the Creeper goes to a local bar to entertain the patrons with his karaoke. When a news anchor reports of a hostage situation, a man David Kang holding his wife and daughter at gunpoint, the Creeper springs into action. The Creeper gets the drop on King, tackling him to the ground. Creeperâs morality wonât let him kill King, but it wonât stop him from making King into a shooting target for the police snipers outside. The snipers kill King, allowing Creeper to return to the bar and his karaoke.
name: Nightwing

description:
Overview

From the pages of the smash hit Villains United comes the 6-issue miniseries Secret Six, written by Gail Simone (BIRDS OF PREY, JLA CLASSIFIED) with art by Brad Walker (DETECTIVE COMICS) & Jimmy Palmiotti with covers by Karl Kerschl (ADVENTURES OF SUPERMAN)!Â  They're a mysterious team, with a confidential roster, that walks the line between good and evil...and takes on the dirtiest, craziest missions in the DCU.Â  And their first mission is to rescue one of their own from a North Korean prison before he's executed!
name: Six Degrees of Devastation, Part One: Exposed

description:
Overview

The thrilling follow-up to the smash-hit Villains United continues! Someone's out to get the Six, and this vicious figure from the group's past won't rest until they've been picked off one by one. Who will be the first beneath fall to the assassin's blade?
name: Six Degrees of Devastation, Part Two: The First Cut is the Deepest

description:
Overview

Introducing the team's newest member! The hunt is on as some of the world's most dangerous killers are getting paid ridiculous chunks of cash to bring down the Secret Six. But the Six have some tricks - and a whole lot of bullets - up their own sleeves...
name: Six Degrees of Devastation, Part Three: The Darkest House

description:
Overview

It's the Secret Six versus the Doom Patrol, fresh off their appearance in Teen Titans! As the Six hunt down the villain who has been targeting them, they uncover some startling secrets. What does the all-new Doom Patrol have to do with all of it?
name: Six Degrees of Devastation, Part Four: Spiders on the Wind

description: The joking web head and the detective dark knight fight the two most phsycotic villains in Marvel Universe and DC Universe, CARNAGE and THE JOKER!! together tryin to kill our heroes.
name: Disordered Minds

description:
Overview

The penultimate issue! Sick and tired of being hunted, the Six decide to turn the tables on their mysterious pursuer. Will they succeed, or will this just be a suicide mission?
name: Six Degrees of Devastation, Part Five: Life As We Know It

description:
Overview

The final issue! The Secret Six take on Vandal Savage in his mountain lair, and not all will live to tell the tale! You can't miss this one!
name: Six Degrees of Devastation, Part Six: Cutting the Cord

description: Gunplay is the haunting tale of a Buffalo Soldier named Abner, condemned to roam the Old West with a hellish curse slung at his waist: a demonic shooting iron that forces him to kill once a day or suffer soul-searing pain. His salvation lies in earning the trust of a boy he's never met; a boy with an angonizing secret of his own. This 32-page preview invites readers to ride alongside Abner as he transforms from nightmare gunman to high plains folk hero. Priest provides prose back-up stories in each issue, chronicling the Legend of Abner.
name: Preview

description:
This is it! Based on the hit movie and the smash cartoon show! ALL NEW fabulous adventures of the Real Ghostbusters in the quality only NOW comics can deliver!

In this premiere collector's issue we find the Real Ghostbusters up against a ghost of Captain Nemo!?
